label: AvailablePeriod
comment: A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date for which something is available.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.

referencedBy.comment: An available ordering period for this specified marketplace.
